space_invaders.name: Zog
space_invaders.funny_fact: Zog loves to eat asteroid sandwiches!

space_invaders.name: Glix
space_invaders.funny_fact: Glix communicates through intergalactic dance moves!

space_invaders.name: Blip
space_invaders.funny_fact: Blip is afraid of black holes!

space_invaders.name: Flurp
space_invaders.funny_fact: Flurp once mistook a comet for a giant space marshmallow!

space_invaders.name: Snix
space_invaders.funny_fact: Snix dreams of opening a space-themed bakery!

space_invaders.name: Klop
space_invaders.funny_fact: Klop's favorite hobby is asteroid surfing!

space_invaders.name: Dweeb
space_invaders.funny_fact: Dweeb collects space rocks as souvenirs!

space_invaders.name: Bloop
space_invaders.funny_fact: Bloop's spaceship runs on cosmic energy!

space_invaders.name: Quix
space_invaders.funny_fact: Quix is a master at zero-gravity yoga!

space_invaders.name: Chirp
space_invaders.funny_fact: Chirp has a secret stash of space disco music!
